<script>
var t = async_test("Relative color works as color input with currentcolor");
_addTest(function(canvas, ctx) {

  canvas.setAttribute('style', 'color: magenta');
  ctx.fillStyle = "rgb(from currentcolor g r b)";
  _assertSame(ctx.fillStyle, 'color(srgb 0 1 1)', "ctx.fillStyle", "'color(srgb 0 1 1)'");
  ctx.strokeStyle = "rgb(from currentcolor g r b)";
  _assertSame(ctx.strokeStyle, 'color(srgb 0 1 1)', "ctx.strokeStyle", "'color(srgb 0 1 1)'");

});
</script>
